alert.note: Alert for Bee; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 22 at 12:13AM CDT until March 22 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LIVE OAK AND NORTHWESTERN BEE COUNTIES... At 1212 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pawnee, or 12 miles northeast of Three Rivers, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Three Rivers, Oakville, Pawnee, Nell, Ray Point and Esseville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 64 and 81. US Highway 281 between mile markers 618 and 620. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
